name: Lith
description: The Lith Subnet powers the Genesis version of MapleStory Universe. An expansion of Nexon’s most widely recognized IP, MapleStory Universe is a virtual world ecosystem that creates a more immersive and engaging adventure by leveraging blockchain technology to craft a unique experience defined by digital scarcity, open ecosystems, and MapleStory NFTs at its core.

chains.description: The Lith L1 powers the Genesis version of MapleStory Universe. An expansion of Nexon’s most widely recognized IP, MapleStory Universe is a virtual world ecosystem that creates a more immersive and engaging adventure by leveraging blockchain technology to craft a unique experience defined by digital scarcity, open ecosystems, and MapleStory NFTs at its core.
chains.name: Lith
